channel.title: 2 Questions [508] [Berkyscape]
channel.description:
1. I need a mute and ban command.
2. How would i make it so a monster randomly drops an item?
Like for example, how would i make Ahrim drop 1 of his set items when you killed him at a 50% drop rate?

item.title: 2 Questions [508] [Berkyscape]
item.dc:creator: @xweetok599 xweetok599
item.description:
@xweetok599 wrote:

  1. Rip them of another source.
  2. Well, search on google: [508] how to add npc drops, once i did too, and i found a good tutorial. Or if u don’t want to search:

http://www.google.com/forums/showthread.php?t=39033

EDIT: Change the google to google, i don’t know why it displays google.

CREDITS DOESN’T GO TO ME!

OMG, sorry, i just can’t say the name here, it will change to google, but just search it on google.

Read full topic
